website_summaries.verdict: The overall reaction towards the Gel Sonoma 5 has been mostly positive. This Asics running shoe is apparently a solid choice for adventures on the great outdoors. The durable construction, the affordable price, and the traction-ready external pad are highlighted. Conversely, some have noted some fabric tearing while others have noticed a restrictive in-shoe feel.Those who enjoy running shoes for the outdoors can welcome the Gel Sonoma 5.
pros: The materials used for the Asics Gel Sonoma 5is lauded for being durable
Some users have mentioned that the upper unit’s overlay system can help the steadiness of the foot
The price of this trail running shoe is considered affordable
A handful of runners have noted that the midsole unit can properly cushion the footfalls
According to some purchasers, moving through the trails is a confident affair because of the trail-optimized outsole
cons: Several people have mentioned that the forefoot section restricts the natural splaying capacity of the toes
A few people have noted that the fabric near the ball of the foot is quick to tear apart

customer_reviews.title: Great for wide feet.
customer_reviews.text: I've got very wide feet. Asics trainers suit their shape very well.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Rees

customer_reviews.title: Not what l expect from Asics
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing Asics running shoes for at least 20 years and these are by far the worst. The toe section is very narrow for some reason. The tounge is very small and the shoe does not feel cushioned. I would say just because its an Asics dont assume it will be comfortable. This is not.
customer_reviews.author: andrew

customer_reviews.title: Trainers
customer_reviews.text: They are comfortable but his toe has come through the top if the trainer so maybe a better material could have been used
customer_reviews.author: Dee Atherton

customer_reviews.title: Designed to fail early.
customer_reviews.text: Did not last very long at all. I have had these a few months and they have not gotten any serious wear. However, the mesh has torn on the front, making them destined for the bin. Had to buy a new pair If something else less than 4 months after purchase. Not impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Natalia McDonagh

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable for running
customer_reviews.text: I got this mainly for light outdoor jogging on the pavement, and it's proved to be a very comfortable and enjoyable experience. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Reader

customer_reviews.title: Great will buy this brand again
customer_reviews.text: Has really improved my running and great for road and off road running, very happy
customer_reviews.author: David Melville

customer_reviews.title: comfortable
customer_reviews.text: it is comfortable and perfect fit but it needs more forefoot cushioning.
customer_reviews.author: eagle

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Great strong shoe, use it walking on and off road, highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: padraig o leary

customer_reviews.title: Great arrived just in time!!!
customer_reviews.text: walking, very comfy, gel sole is amazing, its why asics are great, ideal for summer
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality, I suspect they are fake
customer_reviews.text: In less than 2 months they started to tear and 5 holes have appear on the mesh material. I don't think real Asics shoes would deteriorate so quickly
customer_reviews.author: Rafael S.

customer_reviews.title: ASICS trainers lasted less than 3 months
customer_reviews.text: Less than 3 months use and the webbing on the toe has ripped..very poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: jon sweet

customer_reviews.title: Falling apart
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are really comfy but unfortunately after only 3 months they have started to come apart at the toes. Really disappointed as they should be made of better material for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Fiona Cavana

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but don’t last
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable shoe, used for walking/jogging couple times per week. Good grip and good shock absorption. However after only 4 months the soles are worn have cracked on both shoes. I’m now looking for new shoes and whilst they were good for few months, I won’t be buying these again. I would have expected to get more wear.
customer_reviews.author: CELFROG

product_meta.title: ASICS Men's Gel-Sonoma 5 Running Shoe
product_meta.description: The Gel-Sonoma 5 is a trail running shoe full of specific details for trail running with which you will maintain stability and support on any terrain. Gel in the hindfoot and the eva midsole provide cushioning and ensures a soft landing while tackling more regular footpaths, plus the trail-specific sole provides grip and stability even on the most uneven terrain and in wet conditions. Made for low to medium mileage, the Gel-Sonoma 5 is a durable shoe with a solid and protective upper and a 5M reflectivity that provides visibility even in low light conditions. Details: 10 mm differential; for low to medium mileage; gel on the heel; eva midsole; 5M reflective; eva insole; inner lining in ortholite; specific sole for trail running; very reliable and durable; protective upper.
